name: FNAMG 3 EXTENDED
description: Story: "time to watch some TV" you said "Beep!" "Have you needed some money but your poor? And you need to pay for the job?! then come down to Minigamerds Pizza! A place for family and fun! So every hour you will receive 20 - 30$! Come Call 555-Minigame-pizza now to apply!" "Beep!" "Wow!" you said "I should go there ok wheres my phone?" you said then you found your phone. you called 555-Minigame-pizza. "Hello? Are you wanting to apply to Minigamerds Pizza?" said the phone "Yes!" "then come to this address but before you do that.. we need your phone number, name, and address" "ok my address is" then you said all the stuff you needed to say "ok, now go to this address" said the guy in the phone "ok ill go there! See ya!" "Bye." said the phone guy off you went but you did not notice a tall figure behind your car... ---  gamejolt page: https://gamejolt.com/games/FNAMG3/562540 from the FNAMG series.
